bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: IRQ
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In IRQ mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: FIQ
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In FIQ mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: UND
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In UND mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: ABT
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In ABT mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: SVC
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In SVC mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: USR
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In USR mode

register.name: MIDR
register.description: The Main ID Register returns the device ID code that contains information about the processor

bitField.name: VARIANT
bitField.description: Identifies the major revision of the processor

bitField.name: REVISION
bitField.description: Identifies the minor revision of the processor

register.name: MPUIR
register.description: Holds the values for the number of instruction and data memory regions implemented in the processor

bitField.name: DREGION
bitField.description: Specifies the number of MPU regions

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies the type of MPU regions, unified or separate, in the processor

register.name: MPIDR
register.description: Identifies processor accesses or target processor in a multiprocessor system

bitField.name: CLUSTERID
bitField.description: Identifies a processor in a system with more than one processor present

bitField.name: CPUID
bitField.description: Indicates the CPU number in the multiprocessor configuration

register.name: REVIDR
register.description: Provides implementation-specific minor revision information that can only be interpreted in conjunction with the MIDR

register.name: ID_PFR0
register.description: Provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: STATE3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment

bitField.name: STATE2
bitField.description: Indicates support for acceleration of execution environments in hardware or software

bitField.name: STATE1
bitField.description: Indicates type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports

bitField.name: STATE0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set

register.name: ID_PFR1
register.description: Provides information about the programmers’ model and Security Extensions support

bitField.name: GENTIM
bitField.description: Indicates support for the Generic Timer

bitField.name: MICRO_PMODEL
bitField.description: Indicates support for Microcontroller programmer model

bitField.name: SEC_EXTENSION
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture

bitField.name: ARMV4_PMODEL
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer model

register.name: ID_DFR0
register.description: Provides information about the debug system

bitField.name: PERFMON
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor-based ARM Performance Monitors Extension

bitField.name: MDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped debug model for M profile processors

bitField.name: TDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped trace model

bitField.name: TDM_C
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor-based trace model

bitField.name: CDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory-mapped debug model

bitField.name: SDM
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor-based Secure debug model

bitField.name: CDM_C
bitField.description: Indicates the type of applications processor debug model that the processor supports

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Provides additional information about the features of the processor

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support operations

bitField.name: INSHAR
bitField.description: Indicates the innermost shareability domain implemented

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for Fast Context Switch Extension

bitField.name: AUXCON
bitField.description: Indicates support for the auxiliary registers

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA

bitField.name: SHARE
bitField.description: Indicates the number of shareability levels implemented

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outermost shareability domain implemented

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Physical Memory System Architecture

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support of the processor

bitField.name: L1_TEST_CLEAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by MVA, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support operations of the processor

bitField.name: HAF
bitField.description: Indicates support for Hardware Access Flag

bitField.name: MB
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations

bitField.name: TLB_MO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: TLB_MO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMRO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_BPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_FPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Provides information about the implemented memory model and memory management support

bitField.name: CMS
bitField.description: Indicates the physical memory size supported by the processor caches

bitField.name: CW
bitField.description: Indicates whether translation table updates require a clean to the point of unification

bitField.name: MB
bitField.description: Indicates whether Cache, TLB and branch predictor operations are broadcast

bitField.name: BPMO
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations

bitField.name: HCMO_SW
bitField.description: Indicates support for hierarchical cache maintenance operations by Set and Way

bitField.name: HCMO_MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for hierarchical cache maintenance operations by address

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: COPROCESSOR
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions other than separately attributed feature registers, such as CP15 registers and VFP

bitField.name: CMP_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions

bitField.name: BIT_COUNT
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions

bitField.name: ATOMIC
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: IF_THEN
bitField.description: Indicates support for if then instructions

bitField.name: EXTEND
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions

bitField.name: EXCEPTION2
bitField.description: Indicates support for A and R profile exception-handling instructions

bitField.name: EXCEPTION1
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception-handling instructions in the ARM instruction set

bitField.name: ENDIAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: PSR
bitField.description: Indicates support for A and R profile instructions to manipulate the PSR.

bitField.name: U_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions

bitField.name: S_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions

bitField.name: INTERRUPT
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions

bitField.name: MEM_HINT
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions

bitField.name: LOAD_STORE
bitField.description: Indicates support for additional load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: THUMBEE
bitField.description: Indicates support for ThumbEE Execution Environment extension

bitField.name: TRUE_NOP
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions

bitField.name: THUMB_COPY
bitField.description: Indicates the support for Thumb non flag-setting MOV instructions

bitField.name: TAB_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates the implemented Table Branch instructions in the Thumb instruction set

bitField.name: SYNCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions

bitField.name: SIMD
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: SWPFRAC
bitField.description: Indicates support for the memory system locking the bus for SWP or SWPB instructions

bitField.name: PSRM
bitField.description: Indicates the implemented M profile instructions to modify the PSRs

bitField.name: EXCLUSIVE
bitField.description: This field is used with the ID_ISAR3.SynchPrim_instrs field to indicate the implemented Synchronization Primitive instructions

bitField.name: BARRIER
bitField.description: Indicates the implemented Barrier instructions in the ARM and Thumb instruction sets

bitField.name: WRITE_BACK
bitField.description: Indicates the support for Writeback addressing modes

bitField.name: WITH_SHIFT
bitField.description: Indicates the support for instructions with shifts

register.name: ID_ISAR5
register.description: Provide additional information about the properties of the processor

register.name: CONTEXTIDR
register.description: The Context ID Register holds a process IDentification (ID) value for the currently-running process

register.name: TPIDRURW
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS

register.name: TPIDRURO
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS

register.name: TPIDRPRW
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS

register.name: SCTLR
register.description: Provides control and configuration of: - memory alignment and endianness - memory protection and fault behavior - MPU and cache enables - interrupts and behavior of interrupt latency - location for exception vectors - program flow prediction

bitField.name: IE
bitField.description: Identifies little or big instruction endianness in use

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the state of the CPSR E bit on an exception

bitField.name: DZ
bitField.description: Divide by Zero fault enable bit

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Selects the replacement strategy for caches and BTAC

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached at any available cache level

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses

register.name: ACTLR
register.description: The Auxiliary Control Register controls: - Quality of Service (QoS) settings - ECC checking, if implemented - allocation in one way - automatic data cache coherency - speculative accesses on AXI - broadcast of cache, branch predictor, and maintenance operations - enabling of the Memory Reconstruction Port (MRP), if implemented

bitField.name: ECCITCM
bitField.description: Support for ECC on ITCM, if implemented

bitField.name: ECCDTCM
bitField.description: Support for ECC on instruction and data cache and DTCM, if implemented

bitField.name: FDSNS
bitField.description: Enable allocation in one cache way only

bitField.name: SMP
bitField.description: Signals if the processor is taking part in coherency or not

register.name: CPACR
register.description: Enables software detection and sets access rights for coprocessors CP0-CP13

bitField.name: D32DIS
bitField.description: Enable use of D16-D31 of the VFP register file

register.name: DFSR
register.description: The DFSR holds status information about the last data fault

bitField.name: WNR
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: If LPA Extension is implemented, this bit is cleared to indicate use of Short-descriptor TT formats on Data Aborts

bitField.name: DOMAIN
bitField.description: The domain of the fault address (deprecated)

register.name: IFSR
register.description: The IFSR holds status information about the last instruction fault

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: If LPA Extension is implemented, this bit is cleared to indicate use of Short-descriptor TT formats on Data Aborts

register.name: DFAR
register.description: The DFAR holds the faulting address that caused a synchronous Data Abort exception

register.name: IFAR
register.description: The IFAR holds the address of the access that caused a synchronous Prefetch Abort exception

register.name: PCR
register.description: Enables setting of clock latency and dynamic clock gating

bitField.name: MAXCLKLAT
bitField.description: Samples the value present on the MAXCLKLATENCY pins on exit from reset

bitField.name: DYNCLKGATEN
bitField.description: Enables or disables dynamic clock gating

register.name: CTDOR
register.description: Describes the access operation required for cache and TCM debug

register.name: RADRLO
register.description: Reads the data value for the debug operation or sets the value to be written by the direct RAM access operation

register.name: RADRHI
register.description: Reads the data value for the debug operation or sets the value to be written by the direct RAM access operation

register.name: RAECCR
register.description: Reads the ECC chunk selected by the operation or sets the ECC chunk to be written by the direct RAM access operation

register.name: CBAR
register.description: Holds the physical base address of the memory-mapped Interrupt Controller registers

register_group.name: Cache
register_group.description: Determines the instruction and data minimum line length in bytes to enable a range of addresses to be invalidated

bitField.name: DMINLINE
bitField.description: Indicates log2 of the number of words in the smallest cache line of the data and unified caches

bitField.name: L1IP
bitField.description: Indicates log2 of the number of words in the smallest cache line of the data and unified caches

bitField.name: IMINLINE
bitField.description: Indicates log2 of the number of words in the smallest cache line of the instruction caches

register.name: CCSIDR
register.description: Provides information about the architecture of the caches selected by CSSELR

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for read allocation

bitField.name: WA
bitField.description: Indicates support available for write allocation

bitField.name: LINESIZE
bitField.description: Indicates the number of words in each cache line

register.name: CLIDR
register.description: Indicates the cache levels that are implemented in the processor and under the control of the System Control Coprocessor

bitField.name: LOU
bitField.description: Level of Unification Uniprocessor for the cache hierarchy

bitField.name: LOC
bitField.description: Level of Coherency for the cache hierarchy

bitField.name: LOUIS
bitField.description: Level of Unification Inner Shareable for the cache hierarchy

bitField.name: CL_1
bitField.description: Indicates no unified cache at CL1

bitField.name: IND
bitField.description: Identifies instruction or data cache to use

register.name: ICIALLU
register.description: Invalidate all I-caches to PoU and flush branch predictor arrays

register.name: ICIALLUIS
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU Inner Shareable and flush branch predictors

register.name: ICIMVAU
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache line by address to PoU

register.name: BPIALL
register.description: Invalidate all entries from branch predictors

register.name: BPIALLIS
register.description: Invalidate all entries from branch predictors Inner Shareable

register.name: DCIMVAC
register.description: Invalidate data or unified cache line by address to PoC

register.name: DCISW
register.description: Invalidate data or unified cache line by set/way

register.name: DCCMVAC
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by address to PoC

register.name: DCCSW
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by set/way

register.name: DCCMVAU
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by MVA to PoU

register.name: DCCIMVAC
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data or unified cache line by MVA to PoC

register.name: DCCISW
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data or unified cache line by set/way

register.name: DEER0
register.description: Indicates where data cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: DEER1
register.description: Indicates where data cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: DEER2
register.description: Indicates where data cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: IEER0
register.description: Indicates where instruction cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: IEER1
register.description: Indicates where instruction cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: IEER2
register.description: Indicates where instruction cache ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: WORD_FAULT
bitField.description: Faulty word affected by ECC error

bitField.name: HARD_ERROR
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: DRBAR
register.description: Describes the base address of the region specified by the RGNR

register.name: DRSR
register.description: The DRSR Registers: - specify the size of the region specified by the RGNR - identify the address ranges that are used for a particular region - enable or disable the region, and its sub-regions, specified by the RGNR

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables or disables a memory region

register.name: DRACR
register.description: The MPU Region Access Control Registers hold the region attributes and access permissions for the region specified by the Memory Region Number Register

register.name: RGNR
register.description: Contain the value that determines which of the multiple registers is accessed

bitField.name: Region
bitField.description: Defines the group of registers to be accessed

register_group.name: TCM
register_group.description: Tightly Coupled Memory Configuration and Control.

register.name: TCMTR
register.description: Informs the processor of the number of ATCMs and BTCMs in the system

bitField.name: BTCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of BTCMs implemented

bitField.name: ATCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of ATCMs implemented

register.name: DTCMR
register.description: Indicates the base address and size of the Data TCM region

bitField.name: BASE_ADDRESS
bitField.description: Indicates the data TCM region base address

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: Indicates the data TCM region size

register.name: ITCMR
register.description: Indicates the base address and size of the Instruction TCM region

bitField.name: BASE_ADDRESS
bitField.description: Indicates the Instruction TCM region base address

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: Indicates the Instruction TCM region size

register.name: DTCMEER
register.description: Indicates where data TCM ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: HARD
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: ITCMEER
register.description: Indicates where instruction TCM ECC errors have occurred

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: Faulty index where error has occurred

bitField.name: HARD
bitField.description: Error is hard, that is, only software can write on it

register.name: PMCR
register.description: The Performance Monitor Control Register controls the operation of the three count registers, and the CCNT Register

bitField.name: DP
bitField.description: Disable PMCCNTR when event counting is prohibited

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enable export of the events to the event bus for an external monitoring block

register.name: PMCNTENSET
register.description: Enables the Cycle Count Register, PMCCNTR, and any implemented event counters, PMNx

register.name: PMCNTENCLR
register.description: Disables the Cycle Count Register, PMCCNTR, and any implemented event counters, PMNx

register.name: PMOVSR
register.description: The overflow FLAG status Register indicates if performance monitor counters have overflowed

register.name: PMSWINC
register.description: The PMSWINC register increments a counter that is configured to count the Software increment event, event 0x00

register.name: PMSELR
register.description: The Performance Counter Selection Register selects a Performance Monitor Count Register

register.name: PMCCNTR
register.description: The PMCCNTR holds the value of the processor Cycle Counter, CCNT, that counts processor clock cycles

register.name: PMXEVTYPER
register.description: Configures which event increments the selected event counter

register.name: PMXEVCNTR
register.description: The PMXEVCNTR reads or writes the value of the selected event counter

register.name: PMUSERENR
register.description: PMUSERENR enables or disables User mode access to the Performance Monitors

register.name: PMINTENSET
register.description: Enables the generation of interrupt requests on counter overflows

register.name: PMINTENCLR
register.description: Disables the generation of interrupt requests on counter overflows

bitField.name: P2
bitField.description: Interrupt on PMC2 overflow when enabled

bitField.name: P1
bitField.description: Interrupt on PMC1 overflow when enabled

bitField.name: P0
bitField.description: Interrupt on PMC0 overflow when enabled

register_group.name: Single
register_group.description: VFP Register Bank and Control Registers

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: VFP Implementation. Shows whether FP is implemented in Hardware and Software

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Shows the VFP Coprocessor architecture version

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces a less than result

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal result

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal, greater than, or unordered result

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an unordered result

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: The vector stride is the increment value used to select the registers involved in the next iteration of the short vector instruction

bitField.name: LEN
bitField.description: Controls the vector length for VFP instructions that operate on short vectors. The vector length is the number of iterations in a short vector instruction.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception enable bit

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: A global enable for the Advanced SIMD and Floating-point Extensions. Setting the EN bit to 1 enables the Advanced SIMD and VFP Extension.

bitField.name: HW_square_root_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware square root

bitField.name: Double_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for double precision VFP

bitField.name: Single_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for single precision VFP.

bitField.name: Media_reg_bank_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for the media register bank.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_FMAC
bitField.description: Indicates whether any implemented Floating-point or Advanced SIMD Extension implements the fused multiply accumulate instructions

bitField.name: FVP_HPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Floating-point Extension implements half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_HPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_SPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements single-precision floating-point instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_I
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements integer instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_LS
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements load/store instructions

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Full denormal arithmetic supported for VFP
